snippet: Ms. Cherry, who lived in New York City as a child, has never played a proper show of her own here. That changes on Friday.
abstract: Swedish singer Neneh Cherry is set to perform for first time in New York City at Highline Ballroom to promote her first solo album Blank Project; while Cherry spent much of her childhood in city, and performed in several shows city with the band the Slits in 1981 and in 2011, her upcoming performance in city is her first as fully formed artist in her own right.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Cherry, who lived in New York City as a child, has never played a proper show of her own here. That changes on Friday.

headline.main: Neneh Cherry Will Get an Overdue New York Debut
headline.print_headline: Roving Pop Star in Overdue Debut
